short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically switch to incognito mode when you visit specific websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay Private with Ease

Ever stumbled upon certain websites and thought, 'This should have been opened in incognito!'? Our extension is here to bridge that gap. With a gentle reminder, it prompts users to switch to incognito mode upon visiting predefined or custom-selected sites, ensuring your browsing remains as private as you'd like.

Customization at Your Fingertips

Not just limited to a pre-set list, this tool offers flexibility. Users can easily add websites they personally deem private, tailoring the extension to their unique browsing habits. Concerned about clutter? The built-in option to clear all added websites ensures a clean slate whenever you wish.

Ease of Use

Designed with simplicity in mind, our extension integrates seamlessly with your browsing. A minimalistic user interface ensures prompt actions without the hassle. Experience private browsing redefined.
